article.headline: Lehigh 57, Bucknell 54
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. (AP) -- Joe Knight sank a 3-pointer as time expired to lift Lehigh a 57-54 victory over Bucknell on Sunday. Knight led all scorers with 24 points for Lehigh (12-10, 6-3 Patriot League) and was 10-of-10 from the free throw line. Darren Mastropaolo hit two free throws to tie the game 54-54 for Bucknell (15-7, 6-3) before Knight took the inbound pass, drove the length of the court and hit the winning basket at the buzzer. Knight, who became the 25th Lehigh player to reach 1,000 points, also converted a steal and layup to give the Mountain Hawks a 30-29 halftime lead. The Bison built a 20-7 lead eight minutes into the game, but Lehigh sank 13 of 16 free throws in the half to battle back. Abe Badmus led Bucknell with 15 points while Kevin Bettencourt added 12 points and Charles Lee contributed 10 points. Nick Monserez and Jose Olivero each had nine points for the Mountain Hawks.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
